name: Snaky online
description:
You can play with your friends, with other players (if there's someone playing), or simply with the basic bots in the map.

You can also play whith touchscreen. But it is always better on PC.

Hope you have fun playing it!

Controls:

  •  The mouse to guide your snake
  • Mouse wheel to zoom in/out a bit
  • You can press Esc to stop following the mouse

Mecanincs:

  • To grow, you need the others snakes to collide with your body
  • But if you collide with your head with another snake, or the map limits, you will die.
  • You can sprint by keeping the mouse far from your center.

Extra info:

  • The map on the top right side, displays the real players (in red) and the server bots (in grey), and you (in blue)
